sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-loading-bar-provider>
    <n-config-provider :theme="dark ? darkTheme : null" :theme-overrides="myTheme">
      <n-message-provider>
        <router-view></router-view>
      </n-message-provider>
      <n-global-style />
    </n-config-provider>
  </n-loading-bar-provider>
</template>

<script>
import { ref, provide } from 'vue'

import {
  NConfigProvider, NMessageProvider, darkTheme, NButton,
  NGlobalStyle, useLoadingBar, NLoadingBarProvider
} from 'naive-ui'

import myTheme from './theme.js'

import { useRouter } from "vue-router";

export default {
  name: 'App',
  setup() {

    const dark = ref(false)
    // 向后代组件传递数据
    provide('dark', dark)

    // 进度条
    const loadingBar = useLoadingBar();
    const router = useRouter();
    router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
      document.title = to.meta.title
      //loadingBar.start();
      next();
    });

    router.afterEach(() => {
      //loadingBar.finish();
    });

    return {
      dark,myTheme
    }
  }
}

</script>

<style>

</style>
